name: Kevin White
description: I am single never married .I am in to buying and selling of art sculptures and gold …i am 6 feet tall with an athletic body,mentally stable,physically fit,i like to launch and warm ,caring, honest ,god fearing and good listening woman and i am a positive person..Am looking for a person that will be able to listen to me , communicate his feelings to me , make me laugh, hold and comfort me in need,stand by my side, respect me, passionate lover in every way, support me in everyway, love me and only me, make me smile, protect me when needed, romantic time to time ,constantly creative, and treat me right. I Like an honest and caring person and God Fearing
